repnme.cdata!:
Burkina Faso - Heavily Indebted Poor
            Countries (HIPC) Debt Initative Project

abstracts.cdata!:
The assistance under the Heavily
            Indebted Poor Countries Debt Initiative Project will support
            the implementation of the government's economic and
            social program. It will provide, in conjunction with other
            creditors, special assistance to allow Burkina Faso to reach
            a sustainable debt position by the completion point. The
            delivery of debt relief will be contingent upon monitorable
            actions, including structural policy actions and social
            programs in both the health and education sectors.

0.cdata!: EVALUATION D'UN PROJET DE ROUTES - BENIN

abstracts.cdata!:
The Feeder Road Project for Benin will
            comprise: (a) improvement and subsequent maintenance of
            about 845 km of rural roads, and initial maintenance of 425
            km improved under the Zou-Borgou Cotton Project; (b)
            strengthening of the Directorate of Roads and Bridges (DRB)
            in the Ministry of Equipment by the creation of a new
            division for feeder roads; and (c) technical assistance to
            DRB for the implementation of the above program and for the
            training of local staff.
